channel.title: [delta 317] how to add premote and demote commands [delta 317]
channel.description: I want to add a command that premotes and demotes players automaticaly so i don't have to go into the server files. Please help!

item.title: [delta 317] how to add premote and demote commands [delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

THIS IS FOR DELTA!

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin")                 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Harry")) {
            String name = command.substring(10);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 2;
                c.disconnected = true;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }
        } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
            String name = command.substring(8);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 1;
                c.disconnected = true;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }
        } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
                && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Harry")) {
            String name = command.substring(10);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 3;
                c.disconnected = true;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }
        } else if (command.startsWith("demote")                 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Harry")) {
            String name = command.substring(7);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 0;
                c.disconnected = true;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }

Just change ‘Harry’ with your name
As for donator,idk about that bit sorry
if it doesnt work exactly,maybe tweak it abit?

Read full topic

When i compile after making the mod and admin commands it comes up with this
client.java:7489: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable rights
location: class client
c.rights = 1;
then same but
c.rights = 0;
and both again for the admin command

item.title: [delta 317] how to add premote and demote commands [delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Here you go.

if (command.startsWith("adddonor") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(9); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been promoted to Super-Donator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.donator = 2; savegame(true); sM("You've promoted "+command.substring(4)+" to Super-Donator."); yell(""+playerName+" has promoted "+command.substring(4)+" to Super-Donator."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Make a new command and simply edit this part

c.donator = 2;

Read full topic
